mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, nick_name, password, address, img_Path) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{address}, #{imgPath})
mapper.sql: id, email, password, nick_name, address, img_path
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM free_board WHERE user_id = #{id}) AS boardCount, (select count(*) from free_board_comment where user_id = #{id}) as commentCount, (select count(*) from pet_diary where user_id = #{id}) as diaryCount, nick_name as name, email, img_path as imgPath FROM user where id=#{id};
mapper.sql: id, species, age, weight, disease, name, gender, spec_species as specSpecies, recog_chip as recogChip
mapper.select: SELECT pet_diary.id as id, title, created_at as createdAt, content, pet.name as petName FROM pet_diary, pet where pet_id = pet.id and pet_diary.user_id = #{id} order by created_at desc limit 10;
